# Integrations

Integration is split into:
- **Connectors** (fetch provider data)
- **Processors** (normalize to internal models)
- **Sinks** (persist)
- **Metrics** (materialize outputs)

Provider deep dives:
- GitHub/GitLab: `docs/90-appendix/agent-instructions/connectors/github-gitlab.md`
- Jira: `docs/90-appendix/agent-instructions/connectors/jira.md`
- Atlassian GraphQL: `docs/90-appendix/agent-instructions/connectors/atlassian-graphql.md`
